text: The officer on duty in command of those employees designated by the Administrator as provided in § 9-704, may accept deposit of collateral from any person charged with the violation of any rule or regulation prescribed under this chapter, for appearance in court or before the appropriate United States Magistrate; and such collateral shall be deposited with the United States Magistrate at Alexandria, Virginia.
historical:

DC CODE § 9-706

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Deposit of collateral by person charged with violation.
